name: Meteor Destroyer (neoo41)
description:
Are you ready to defend your base?? In this simple game for the 2-Buttons Jam 2019 you only need 2 button to play!

Z - Rotate the ship Counter-Clockwise/Select options

X - Rotate the ship Clockwise/Change between options

Destroy all meteors to gain money to upgrade your ship!!

PD: QWERTY keyboard preferred...

(OMG This is my first finished game i'm so happy)

WARNING: A black hole can appear if you play too much...
